name: Nature's Call
description:
Made in 72 hours for the "Mini Jame Gam #6" 

Your stomach hurts a lot and you really need to go to the bathroom, can you make it in time? 

Use your color coded keys to open any door that stands between you and the toilet, make sure to hurry up because your butt won't wait on you! 

Made by:

Snowo, Tom Alexanderk, Pancho.
